message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think you'd really find it valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 is my initial asking price, I understand your budget concerns. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $120?
I'm still a bit above my budget at $120. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
